spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

effects.display_string: Set: Disintegrate damage increased by 6% and Pyre damage increased by 6%.
Set: Eternity Surge and Shattering Star's cooldowns are decreased by 4.0 sec and Eternity Surge now grants Essence Burst.

spells.description:
Equip: Every 6 sec, Zap your target and 1 nearby enemy for 21,710 Nature damage.

Casting 30 spells Turbo-Charges you for 15 sec, doubling the frequency of your Zaps and upgrading them into Giga-Zaps, dealing 65,132 Nature Damage instead.

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,401 Intellect. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 114,224 Nature damage over 8 sec.

Equip: Taking damage greater than 25% of your health grants you 2,449 Avoidance and increases healing taken by 10% for 10 sec. This effect may only occur every 90 sec.

Falling damage reduced.

Equip: Gain scendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

scendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
